    tfautograph

    This package implements autograph for R.

    It lets you use tensors in R control flow expressions like if, while and for and automatically translates those expressions into tensorflow graphs.

    It is compatible with and tested against Tensorflow Versions 2.0, 1.15 and 1.14.

    Learn More:

    Start here:

    • Getting Started

    Demos

    • Full MNIST training loop using autograph and Tensorflow 2.0

    Additional Articles:

    • Tensorflow Version 1 and control dependencies: here
    • Giving autograph hints

    Installation

    tfautograph is not yet on CRAN (it will be soon!)

    You can install the development version from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("t-kalinowski/tfautograph")
